fullDescription:

Each product was developed to meet The Momentous Standard™ of quality, efficacy, and transparency, so you can focus your energy on your goals. This Vegan version, including 100% Plant Protein Powder, Creapure Creatine Monohydrate and Vegan Omega-3, makes plant-based nutrition simple, delicious and effective.

title: Creatine
description:
At Momentous, we eliminate all the guesswork by using only Creapure® Creatine, the purest + most potent creatine monohydrate available and considered the gold standard in creatine supplementation. 

C...
fullDescription:
At Momentous, we eliminate all the guesswork by using only Creapure® Creatine, the purest + most potent creatine monohydrate available and considered the gold standard in creatine supplementation. 

Creatine is an amino acid that plays a critical role in cellular energy production by helping boost phosphate reservoirs and supporting the creation of adenosine triphosphate (ATP) throughout the body. ATP is key to driving energy at the cellular level and supports fundamental functions from muscle movement to nerve cell growth, making creatine a daily non-negotiable.

fullDescription: Apigenin is a naturally occurring flavonoid found in chamomile and other plants, known for its calming effects on the brain and its ability to support deeper, more restorative sleep. It’s an effective, non-sedating option for improving sleep quality and managing daily stress.

fullDescription: Acetyl L-Carnitine is a naturally occurring amino acid derivative that supports cognitive function, energy metabolism, and cellular health. It’s ideal for individuals looking to boost cognitive performance, mood, and mitochondrial function.
